name: Spanish and Hispanic Studies
descriptions: Spanish is increasingly important for employment in many areas of the country. Immerse yourself in this rich and vibrant culture to have a better understanding of business, organizations, politics and people.

From small classes and student organizations to opportunities for internships and study abroad, majoring in Spanish or Hispanic studies at TCU allows you to develop relationships with professors, discover the world and establish a strong academic and professional support network.
